public ref class Partitioner abstract sealed

summary.span: Zawiera typowe strategie partycjonowania dla tablic, list i enumerables.

span.span: Provides common partitioning strategies for arrays, lists, and enumerables.

remarks.format: ## Remarks Aby uzyskać więcej informacji, zobacz [niestandardowe Partycjonery dla PLINQ i TPL](~/docs/standard/parallel-programming/custom-partitioners-for-plinq-and-tpl.md).For more information, see [Custom Partitioners for PLINQ and TPL](~/docs/standard/parallel-programming/custom-partitioners-for-plinq-and-tpl.md).

span.span: Creates a partitioner.

MemberSignature.Value: public static System.Collections.Concurrent.OrderablePartitioner<TSource> Create<TSource> (System.Collections.Generic.IEnumerable<TSource> source);
.method public static hidebysig class System.Collections.Concurrent.OrderablePartitioner`1<!!TSource> Create<TSource>(class System.Collections.Generic.IEnumerable`1<!!TSource> source) cil managed
Public Shared Function Create(Of TSource) (source As IEnumerable(Of TSource)) As OrderablePartitioner(Of TSource)
static member Create : seq<'Source> -> System.Collections.Concurrent.OrderablePartitioner<'Source>

span.span: Type of the elements in source enumerable.
The enumerable to be partitioned.
Creates an orderable partitioner from a instance.

returns.span: Partycjonera prędkości, oparte na tablicy wejściowej.

span.span: An orderable partitioner based on the input array.

remarks.format: ## Remarks Porządkowanie używane w utworzonej partycjonera zależy od naturalnych kolejność elementów zgodnie z pobranego ze źródła wyliczalny.The ordering used in the created partitioner is determined by the natural order of the elements as retrieved from the source enumerable. Aby uzyskać więcej informacji i przykładów, zobacz [niestandardowe Partycjonery dla PLINQ i TPL](~/docs/standard/parallel-programming/custom-partitioners-for-plinq-and-tpl.md).For more information and examples, see [Custom Partitioners for PLINQ and TPL](~/docs/standard/parallel-programming/custom-partitioners-for-plinq-and-tpl.md).

MemberSignature.Value: public static System.Collections.Concurrent.OrderablePartitioner<TSource> Create<TSource> (System.Collections.Generic.IList<TSource> list, bool loadBalance);

.method public static hidebysig class System.Collections.Concurrent.OrderablePartitioner`1<!!TSource> Create<TSource>(class System.Collections.Generic.IList`1<!!TSource> list, bool loadBalance) cil managed
Public Shared Function Create(Of TSource) (list As IList(Of TSource), loadBalance As Boolean) As OrderablePartitioner(Of TSource)
static member Create : System.Collections.Generic.IList<'Source> * bool -> System.Collections.Concurrent.OrderablePartitioner<'Source>

span.span: Type of the elements in source list.

param.name: list
param.span: Na liście, aby można podzielić na partycje.

span.span: The list to be partitioned.

param.name: loadBalance
param.span: Wartość logiczna wskazująca, czy utworzony partycjonera powinien dynamicznego równoważenia obciążenia między partycje, a nie statycznie partycji.

span.span: A Boolean value that indicates whether the created partitioner should dynamically load balance between partitions rather than statically partition.
Creates an orderable partitioner from an instance.

returns.span: Partycjonera prędkości, na podstawie listy danych wejściowych.

span.span: An orderable partitioner based on the input list.
